Product Description:
Product description    
 Keep your cricket gear organised together and carry it anywhere effortlessly in the Solimo Cricket Kit Bag. The black-hued cricket kit bag is manufactured using water-repellent polyester fabric on the outside to prevent your cricket gear from getting wet during rains. The interior of the bag is made using polyester fabric which is sturdy and durable. The cricket kit bag is equipped with a high-quality zipper tested for 500 cycles, allowing smooth movement while opening and closing the bag. To ensure strength and longevity, the cricket kit bag undergoes 19 product tests. The bag consists of a side compartment for specifically accommodating a long cricket bat with ease. For storing mobile, keys and other such smaller items, there's a provision of a front and side compartment. The cricket kit bag's main compartment can spaciously carry two sets of racquets, padded gloves, leg guards, helmet, cricket balls, extra pair of clothing, shoes, water bottle, and fitness accessories such as bands, grips, and more such essential gear. The Solimo Cricket Kit Bag is an apt choice for storing your cricket gear in one place and for carrying it around, wherever you go. The presence of adjustable shoulder straps allows you to carry the kit bag on shoulders like a backpack without any hassle.

Product Description:
Product description    
 Keep your cricket gear organised together and carry it anywhere effortlessly in the Solimo Cricket Kit Bag. The black-hued cricket kit bag is manufactured using water-repellent polyester fabric on the outside to prevent your cricket gear from getting wet during rains. The interior of the bag is made using polyester fabric which is sturdy and durable. The cricket kit bag is equipped with a high-quality zipper tested for 500 cycles, allowing smooth movement while opening and closing the bag. To ensure strength and longevity, the cricket kit bag undergoes 19 product tests. The bag consists of a side compartment for specifically accommodating a long cricket bat with ease. For storing mobile, keys and other such smaller items, there's a provision of a front and side compartment. The cricket kit bag's main compartment can spaciously carry two sets of racquets, padded gloves, leg guards, helmet, cricket balls, extra pair of clothing, shoes, water bottle, and fitness accessories such as bands, grips, and more such essential gear. The Solimo Cricket Kit Bag is an apt choice for storing your cricket gear in one place and for carrying it around, wherever you go. The presence of adjustable shoulder straps allows you to carry the kit bag on shoulders like a backpack without any hassle.

Description: KEY FEATURES - Black Colour Backpack for Men and Women for Stylish Office use as well as for Trendy College students. Huge compartment size that can fit upto a 15.6 inch Laptop with ease. Multiple pockets for other accessories.    Charging On the Go - Now charge your phone on the go while travelling without the hassle of holding the bulky power bank in your pocket or in your hand. Simple Connect your Powerbank to the wire inside the Bag and leave it in the bag. When you want to charge your phone, just connect your phone charger to the bag and your phone will start charging. Note: We do not provide Power Bank with this Bag.    Anti Theft Design - This backpack by Fur Jaden has anti theft design where zipper of the main pocket is hidden at the back. No thief, intruder or robber can find a way to open the backpack, making this totally theft proof. Product Description:
Product description    
 When looking for the best home gym equipment and workout essentials, Aurion has you covered. Our brand provides a variety of quality products ranging from weightlifting belts to boxing gloves and more. At Aurion, we understand that physical activity plays a crucial role in maintaining a healthy lifestyle. Our durable and reliable gym equipment provides you with an effective workout anywhere and at any time of the day. Our products are designed to meet any budget and are made for rough and extended use. Whether toning up your biceps or refining your abs, we ensure you have the perfect training setup for any kind of exercise while still being lightweight and space-saving. Aurion is your partner in achieving your health and fitness goals! We provide everything you need to stay in shape ‚Äì dumbbells, skipping ropes, punching bags, fitness kits, weightlifting belts, and much more! Our carefully selected equipment features premium materials that ensure maximum durability and reliability. Aurion is committed to providing top-quality products. We also house an extensive range of sports equipment like bags, volleyballs, footballs, and cricket bats. So, no matter what sport or activity you‚Äôre passionate about, Aurion has the right gear for you. With our reliable products and budget-friendly prices ‚Äì we‚Äôre ready to become a part of your fitness story! Our range also includes boxing gloves, ideal for those wanting to kick up their fitness routine a notch.
